id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this MCP23016 component.

*See also: [MCP23016 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp230xx.html#id1)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x20`.

*See also: [MCP23016 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp230xx.html#id1)*
